about_the_game:
Explosive Track

is an intense action racing game set within a virtual gaming world inspired by Split/Second and movie Ready Player One. Competitors will complete to be the first to the finish line using power plays on an island set rigged to blow with the ultimate goal of becoming the season champion. Players must use perfect timing to explode huge structures and set pieces to tactically knockout the opponents in one hit.

Game Features:

Different types of explosive set pieces

based on helicopter drops, construction site, port harbor, apocalypse, urban city.

The Island Is Your Weapon

- There are multiple trigger zones on island with different type of rigged to blow explosive sets. Trigger explosions lined throughout the track that drastically alter the dynamics of the race. If timed right this can knockout the opponents in one hit.

Race Modes

– Compete in a variety of race modes like Race, Time Attack, Elimination.

Other Game Modes

– Compete in a variety of other game modes like Detonator, Spiky Track, Rolling Barrels, Airstrike to improve and test your skills.

Story Mode

- A short image and text based story that will immerse you in this racing world.

Local Multiplayer

- Race against your family and friends on split screen and have loads of fun.

Multiplayer

- Race against opponents on server in various race modes to rank up and become the legend.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains frequent structure and vehicle explosions.

name: Explosive Track - Crazy Action Arcade Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 730
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explosive Track is an intense action racing game set within a virtual gaming world. Competitors will complete to be the first to the finish line with power plays on an island set rigged to blow with the ultimate goal of becoming the season champion. Inspired by Split/Second.
